GSLB_Domain.title: GSLB_Domain
GSLB_Domain.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for a domain.

domainName.title: Domain Name
domainName.description: The name of the domain for the site content you are load balancing. If you have many domains, you can use two different wildcard characters, * and ?, to represent one or more characters in the domain alias, which reduces the number of aliases you have to add to the configuration

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: List of alternate domain names. Each may include wildcard characters.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: When true (default), the system can use the domain and its resources for load balancing requests

failureRcode.title: Failure RCODE
failureRcode.description: Specifies the DNS RCODE used when failure-rcode-response is enabled

failureRcodeResponse.title: Return Code On Failure
failureRcodeResponse.description: Specifies whether RCODE responses are enabled

failureRcodeTtl.title: Return Code On Failure's TTL
failureRcodeTtl.description: Specifies the negative caching TTL of the SOA for the RCODE response

resourceRecordType.title: Resource Record (RR) Type
resourceRecordType.description: Specifies the type of resource records for this domain

pools.title: Pools
pools.description: Specifies the pools that this domain uses for load balancing. The system evaluates the pools in the order in which they are listed, until it finds a matching pool

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to GSLB Pool declaration

ratio.title: Ratio weight
ratio.description: Ratio weight assigned to GSLB pool

poolsCname.title: Pools Cname
poolsCname.description: Specifies the cname pools this domain uses for load balancing. The system evaluates the pools in the order in which they are listed, until it finds a matching pool

poolLbMode.title: Pool Load Balancing Mode
poolLbMode.description: Specifies the load balancing method used to select a pool in this domain

lastResortPool.title: Last Resort Pool
lastResortPool.description: Specifies the pools this domain uses for load balancing. The system evaluates the pools in the order in which they are listed, until it finds a matching pool

lastResortPoolType.title: Last Resort Pool type
lastResortPoolType.description: This is used to specify the type of pool being used for the lastResortPool

loadBalancingDecisionLogVerbosity.title: Load Balancing Decision Log Verbosity
loadBalancingDecisionLogVerbosity.description: Specifies the amount of detail logged when making load balancing decisions. This is used for debugging purposes only. Performance will be affected if any value is set. Please reset after debugging is finished.

iRules.title: iRules
iRules.description: List of GSLB iRules for this GSLB Domain (order is significant)

items.title: iRule
items.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to GSLB_iRule (declared separately)

bigip.title: BIG-IP GTM iRule
bigip.description: Pathname of existing BIG-IP GTM iRule

use.title: Use
use.description: BIG-IP AS3 pointer to GSLB_iRule (declared separately)

persistenceEnabled.title: Persistence
persistenceEnabled.description: Specifies that when a local DNS server makes repetitive requests on behalf of a client, the system reconnects the client to the same resource as previous requests. Set to true to enable.

persistCidrIpv4.title: PersistCidrIpv4
persistCidrIpv4.description: Specifies a mask used to group IPv4 LDNS addresses.

persistCidrIpv6.title: PersistCidrIpv6
persistCidrIpv6.description: Specifies a mask used to group IPv6 LDNS addresses.

ttlPersistence.title: TTL Persistence
ttlPersistence.description: Specifies, in seconds, the length of time for which a persistence entry is valid.

clientSubnetPreferred.title: Client Subnet Preferred
clientSubnetPreferred.description: Specifies that this domain should use the edns0 client subnet option when using topology load balancing. If the query does not contain a client subnet option, the system will fall back to the default option of using the source address.

GSLB_Domain_A.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for A domain.

GSLB_Domain_AAAA.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for AAAA domain.

GSLB_Domain_CNAME.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for CNAME domain.

GSLB_Domain_MX.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for MX domain.

GSLB_Domain_NAPTR.description: Configures GSLB (Global Server Load Balancing) settings for NAPTR domain.

GSLB_iRule.title: GSLB_iRule
GSLB_iRule.description: Specifies or configures an iRule for use in GSLB Domains

expand.title: Expand
expand.description: If true (default), expand backquoted variables in iRule
